name: 2016-nyc-open-data-plan-foil-reporting-metrics
title: 2016 NYC Open Data Plan - FOIL Reporting Metrics
keywords: 2016 nyc open data plan - foil reporting metrics
description: Agency FOIL reporting as per Local 7 of 2016.
column_names: The total number of FOIL responses that resulted in data being posted voluntarily on the open data portal
The total number of FOIL responses that included the release of data
The total number of FOIL responses that included a public data set that had not yet been included on the open data portal
